Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! New residents have
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought them here to introduce them
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>You're <MYNAME>? Exactly as I imagined you
to be!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>My name is <BLUE>Charles</BLUE>. Nice to meet you!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am Charles' wife, <BLUE>Camellia</BLUE>. It sounds
like we'll be counting on you from now
on, too. Very nice to meet you.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice to meet you, <MYNAME>! This is my
first time coming to a farm like this.
This place looks like so much fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm sure I'll be around to play often!
I hope that's okay!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've decided to set up a <GREEN>travel agency</GREEN>
here in town.
<PAGE>
We can fly you anywhere you want to go!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Charles is an excellent pilot, so you
have nothing to worry about.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Ah, of course, it isn't going to be
free. Hee hee hee...

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come by and see us sometime. I'm sure
you'll find a great deal.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
These two are my beloved wife, <BLUE>Camellia</BLUE>,
and my beloved daughter, <BLUE>Hina</BLUE>.
